name: LuL!
description:
Probably one of the best time killing games you'll ever play!

LuL! is a mini endless arcade themed game where you have to drag a ball around your screen and save it from the obstacles that keep coming at you.

NOTE: The game currently is in beta state so there are only few content. Active development will soon bring more content and features in the near future.

-----------------------------------------------------------

Features

Endless mode
Offline (No internet access required)
Singleplayer
Active development (Expect updates real soon)

-----------------------------------------------------------

Little word from dev: Hey! It's TheBlaze0_o here. I am a rookie indie game developer who's still in the learning phrase of game development. This is the second game I ever made in my whole entire life (first one ended horribly, don't ask why) and my first ever succesful project that I made public (the feeling is real good). Would be very glad if you could judge the game and leave suggestions in the comments down below.

-----------------------------------------------------------
